body:
Hi guys,
I have recently been looking for a computer since mine atm is starting to slow down and I would like to have it in my room.
I have seen some good pentium gaming pcs that are pretty good for the price.
One last thing, i found this laptop: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16834317597 for like $250 and runs games decently.

Ok, 
The games i will be playing:
CS:GO, Minecraft, payday 2, elder scrolls.
I would like to play mc in shaders with at least 40 fps in single player.
My price budget is $350, thanks!
body_tagged:

My price budget is $350, thanks!
title: I need help finding the best PC!

replies.body:
My laptop can run shaders at 60 fps on avicus and gets around 150-200 fps without 
But gets 100-150 fps on csgo lemme find a link to it

replies.body:
You're saying that your budget is 350 but that lenovo laptop is $559.89.
Am I missing something here? :p
Clarify this miscommunication and maybe I'll be worth help. What's your budget or what are you willing to spend up to?

replies.body: Build a PC. Laptop's at your price range aren't going to have dedicated GPUs, which if you don't understand will make your performance slower than me on a Monday morning. They PC build guide I suggested will get you a decent 100 FPS MINIMUM.
